body_html:
Once @reedwm's explicit padding is in, adding another constant to the API is not a problem. We should call it something other than "SAME_RESNET", maybe "VALID_STATIC"?

Before the fix, adding it may be too disruptive to be worthwhile, but I'll defer to Reed on that.

Before the fix, adding it may be too disruptive to be worthwhile, but I'll defer to Reed on that.
body:
Once @reedwm's explicit padding is in, adding another constant to the API is not a problem. We should call it something other than "SAME_RESNET", maybe "VALID_STATIC"?

Before the fix, adding it may be too disruptive to be worthwhile, but I'll defer to Reed on that.
